sentences.sentence: Looking at the old mummy rictus needing to speak, I just anticipate single-step: "Finish writing vacation first plan".
sentences.translation: 看老妈张口要说话，我便抢先一步：“先写好假期计划。”

sentences.sentence: Suddenly, the old mummy gives off without the knowledge of from anywhere , look at the old mummy rictus needing to speak, I just anticipate single-step: "Finish writing vacation first plan ".
sentences.translation: 忽然，老妈不知从哪儿冒出来，看老妈张口要说话，我便抢先一步：“先写好假期计划。”
